pages.text: $(italic)Whenever you leave your home, you carry half a tool shed with you. Not really worth mentioning, given the amount of stone you carry around with you. Nevertheless, a universal tool that combines the abilities of a pickaxe, axe and shovel would suit you.$()$(br)

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: It's not as efficient in the individual tasks, but it is much better than having to change tools every three seconds.
